name: Chibo Garden (Pc/Android/Linux)(v0.98)
description:
This garden is a sanctuary for chibos! Here, they live peacefully and you can choose to raise them if you want!

The garden is currently rather empty so there's plenty of freedom for
you to decorate it how you want. How the garden will look will be up to
you!

You can earn coins by playing mini-games to buy various things for the
chibos and your garden! Don't worry if you feel that you aren't that
good with mini-games. They are optional and they have different
difficulty settings you can choose depending on whether you want to just
relax or be challenged.

You're welcome to have fun and enjoy this little sanctuary!
